    Class InjectClaimParameterFilterAttribute

    This Filter Will inject the username claim in the action Parameters

    Namespace: Innovt.AspNetCore.Filters
    Assembly: Innovt.AspNetCore.dll
    Syntax
    [AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class|AttributeTargets.Method)]
public sealed class InjectClaimParameterFilterAttribute : ActionFilterAttribute, IActionFilter, IAsyncActionFilter, IResultFilter, IAsyncResultFilter, IOrderedFilter, IFilterMetadata
